scripts.debug: npm run clean:dist && install && mkdir dist && npm run static && npm run css && npm run js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm install && mkdir dist && npm run static:min && npm run css:min && npm run js:min
scripts.static: cp -r webapp/assets/. dist && cp webapp/index.html dist
scripts.static:min: npm run static && place dist/index.html style.css style.min.css && place dist/index.html main.js main.min.js
scripts.prejs: npm install lib && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.js:min: npm run js && babel-minify dist/main.js > dist/main.min.js
